locations.description: Goal, requirements, assumptions, and scale classification for WireTuner v0.1.
Architectural style, stack, components, data model, API, and communication patterns.
Planned diagrams/specifications with formats, purposes, and iteration references.
Proposed workspace tree spanning packages, docs, api, scripts, and plan artifacts.
Process constraints covering command hygiene, anchors, quality gates, and concurrency rules.
Iteration plan summary with total iterations and dependency narrative.
Iteration 1 goal, scope, and prerequisites (Foundation & Event Core).
Task I1.T1 – Initialize Flutter/melos workspace, packages, and lint config.
Task I1.T2 – Create component-level PlantUML diagram.
Task I1.T3 – Define event recorder/replayer/snapshot interfaces.
Task I1.T4 – Implement SQLite gateway, migrations, and tests.
Task I1.T5 – Author event flow sequence diagram with sampling/replay notes.
Task I1.T6 – Draft event schema reference with JSON examples.
Task I1.T7 – Bootstrap CI workflows for lint/tests/diagram validation.
Task I1.T8 – Add logging/metrics instrumentation for event core.
Task I1.T9 – Record ADRs for hybrid state/history and multi-window design.
Task I1.T10 – Provide developer tooling configs, justfile, and workflow doc.
Iteration 2 summary for vector engine, geometry, and rendering spine.
Task I2.T1 – Mermaid ERD for events/snapshots/metadata schema.
Task I2.T2 – Vector model specification covering document/path/shape entities.
Task I2.T3 – Implement geometry primitives, segments, and tests.
Task I2.T4 – Snapshot serializer/deserializer with versioning doc.
Task I2.T5 – Canvas, viewport, and selection overlay foundation.
Task I2.T6 – Render pipeline with strokes/fills, caching, and tests.
Task I2.T7 – Hit-testing utilities and BVH acceleration documentation.
Task I2.T8 – Viewport controller shortcuts, persistence, and tests.
Task I2.T9 – Rendering benchmark harness and documentation.
Task I2.T10 – Integration test from events to canvas rendering.
Task I2.T11 – Rendering troubleshooting guide with scenarios/remediations.
Iteration 3 summary for tool framework, selection, and pen core.
Task I3.T1 – Implement tool manager, registry, and provider wiring.
Task I3.T2 – PlantUML state machine for selection/direct-selection/pen tools.
Task I3.T3 – Selection Tool implementation with events and tests.
Task I3.T4 – Direct Selection Tool with anchor/BCP manipulation.
Task I3.T5 – Cursor manager and tool hint overlays for parity.
Task I3.T6 – Pen tool initial anchor creation and preview overlay.
Task I3.T7 – Pen tool Bezier handle support and documentation.
Task I3.T8 – Overlay registry ensuring deterministic stacking.
Task I3.T9 – Tool telemetry + undo label annotations.
Task I3.T10 – Integration tests and QA checklist for selection/pen flows.
Task I3.T11 – Documentation refresh with tool usage instructions.
Iteration 4 summary for undo/redo, history UX, and direct manipulation polish.
Task I4.T1 – Operation grouping service enforcing idle thresholds.
Task I4.T2 – Undo timeline Mermaid diagram.
Task I4.T3 – Undo/redo navigator integrating snapshots and operations.
Task I4.T4 – History panel UI with thumbnails and scrubbing.
Task I4.T5 – Direct manipulation snapping/inertia enhancements.
Task I4.T6 – Adaptive snapshot tuning and instrumentation.
Task I4.T7 – Multi-window undo/logging isolation and documentation.
Task I4.T8 – History transport controls and keyboard shortcuts.
Task I4.T9 – Crash recovery integration test and playbook.
Task I4.T10 – History export/import debug utilities.
Task I4.T11 – History/undo documentation and QA checklist updates.
Iteration 5 summary for persistence, import/export, and parity/release work.
Task I5.T1 – Save orchestrator for .wiretuner files.
Task I5.T2 – File format specification (api/file_format_spec.md).
Task I5.T3 – Load service with version checks and round-trip tests.
Task I5.T4 – AI import Tier-2 matrix + importer implementation.
Task I5.T5 – SVG export pipeline with validator-backed tests.
Task I5.T6 – PDF export implementation and verification.
Task I5.T7 – SVG import implementation with notes on coverage.
Task I5.T8 – Platform parity checklist + automated smoke tests.
Task I5.T9 – Release packaging scripts and workflows.
Task I5.T10 – Final QA report and regression matrix.
Task I5.T11 – README/release note refresh with download instructions.
Testing levels, CI/CD, quality gates, and artifact validation approach.
Definitions for recurring project terms (ADR, BCP, Hybrid State, etc.).
QA checklist for undo/redo navigation, history panel, operation grouping, and timeline playback with manual test procedures for macOS/Windows.
Complete user guide for History Panel including navigation, keyboard shortcuts, redo branch behavior, workflows, and troubleshooting.
Dev-only history export/import feature for debugging, crash reproduction, and development workflows with CLI reference and security warnings.
